string.text: Find %s
%s are required by Mangun to install basic equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
I can really use a good set of tools, stalker...and maybe some money. If you are interested in helping me out, I will tell you what I am looking for.
I need a set of basic tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me I will be grateful, I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
Cool dude...uh, sorry I can't pay you. I'll give you a good discount though, man!
Find %s
%s are required by Mangun to install advanced equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
Hey, dude, if you happen to find some more advanced tools I will give you a discount. Will you keep a lookout for me?
I need a set of advanced tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me I will be grateful, I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
Great...GREAT! Now maybe I can make some damn money. I'm gonna be BIG time, stalker...if I can just get my act together. I don't have much to offer you other then a discount. Sorry, bud.
Find %s
%s are required by Mangun to install expert equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
Hey, dude, if you happen to find some more advanced tools I will give you a discount. Will you keep a lookout for me?
I need a set of expert tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me I will be grateful, I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
Great...GREAT! Now maybe I can make some damn money. I'm gonna be BIG time, stalker...if I can just get my act together. I don't have much to offer you other then a discount. Sorry, bud.
Conquer Territory
You have been tasked to advance on a territorial threat within an area. Report back to General Petrenko after the job is done.
I have been informed that a threat to one of our camps exists. We must react before they move in. I need someone capable of carrying this task out.
The task is done? Good.
Defend Territory
You have been tasked to defend a faction territory. Report back to General Petrenko after the job is done.
I have an important mission available. Duty has taken over one of our camps and I need a squad of good men to reclaim it.
The task is done? Good job.
Assassination
General Petrenko has ordered you to find and eliminate the target.

I have a list of VIPs that need...taken care of. Some are informants, high-ranking Freedom members, squad leaders, tacticians or just plain scum. Extract information if you can, otherwise kill-on-sight.
Great! You do us proud. Here is what I promised:
